author: Deccan
title: Sidharth and Alia’s Shaandaar outing
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 23, 2015, 23.33 pm Alia Bhatt and Sidharth Malhotra They’ve long refuted the speculation around their relationship, but when Alia Bhatt and Sidharth Malhotra were snapped heading out for a special screening of Shaandaar together, the photographs had a different story to tell.
Photographers spotted the young stars chatting away in their vehicle as they made their way to the YRF theatre where Shaandaar director Vikas Bahl was hosting the screening. They were even dressed in identical outfits — teaming white tees with ripped blue jeans.
(Photo: Viral Bhayani)
Incidentally, these photos come right after shutterbugs had spotted Alia paying a late night visit to Sidharth’s home, before he jetted off for a New Zealand trip. However, Alia had said that she wasn’t the only one visiting Sidharth — other mutual friends had accompanied her as well.
Sid and Alia’s relationship came under scrutiny after her Shaandaar co-star Shahid Kapoor said that the actress was always on her phone, talking to someone called “Sid”.
However, it was later revealed that the person Alia was on the phone with 24x7 was her marketing manager — and not the hunky Bollywood star!
